name: Ultra Off-Road 2019: Alaska
description: ‘Ultra Off-Road’ is an Indie simulator of off-road driving in the land of Alaska.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 (4 Cores) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: A pink one will do.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 (8 cores) Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Green for better quality.
